metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5816 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: An integer overflow error within the "identify()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.12 can beexploited to trigger a division by zero via specially crafted NOKIARAW file(Note: This vulnerability is caused due to an incomplete fix ofCVE-2018-5804).

criterions.comment: darktable package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
